fn.p: Funding. This work was generously supported by the GALVmed organization (recombinant virus construction, selection, and characterization) (under grant no. 710/CAP/07/003) and the Canadian International Development Research Centre in collaboration with Global Affairs Canada, within the Canadian International Food Security Research Fund (CIFSRF) Grant no. 107848-002 (cattle trial). IDRC have also kindly agreed to pay the APF.
